column5: Wondering if any one has gotten any perch out of Maitland , specifically if they have moved shallow yet. Want to take my daughter and perching in waves and 55 feet of water isnt that much fun.   thanks   Darren
Hi Darren  Last that I had heard was things were still slow out of Port Maitland.  There has been action farther west off Port Burwell from what I have been hearing.  Cheers  Craig
